类 MyAgent

    • genius.core.parties.AbstractNegotiationParty

  • 所有已实现的接口:
    genius.core.parties.NegotiationParty, java.io.Serializable

    public class MyAgent
extends genius.core.parties.AbstractNegotiationParty
    A simple example agent that makes random bids above a minimum target utility.
    作者:
    Tim Baarslag
    另请参阅:
